title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: The story of the mysteriously wealthy Jay Gatsby and his love for the beautiful Daisy Buchanan.

title: Clean Code
author: Robert C. Martin
description: Even bad code can function. But if code isn't clean, it can bring a development organization to its knees.

title: A Brief History of Time
author: Stephen Hawking
description: A landmark volume in science writing by one of the great minds of our time.

title: The Pragmatic Programmer
author: Andrew Hunt, David Thomas
description: The Pragmatic Programmer cuts through the increasing specialization and technicalities of modern software development.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: From a renowned historian comes a groundbreaking narrative of humanity's creation and evolution.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: The romantic clash between the opinionated Elizabeth and her proud beau, Mr. Darcy.

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: A great modern classic and the prelude to The Lord of the Rings.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
author: Thomas H. Cormen
description: A comprehensive update of the leading algorithms text in common use worldwide.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: Set on the desert planet Arrakis, Dune is the story of the boy Paul Atreides.

title: Guns, Germs, and Steel
author: Jared Diamond
description: A global account of the rise of civilization that is also a stunning refutation of racist biological theories.
